name: Styrene-acrylic copolymers produced by polymerizing a minimum of 72 parts by weight of styrene with a minimum of 4 parts of methyl methacrylate and with up to 10 parts total of any one or more of the following monomers: butyl methacrylate, methacrylic acid, butyl acrylate, acrylic acid and allyl methacrylate
FoodContactSubstance: Styrene-acrylic copolymers produced by polymerizing a minimum of 72 parts by weight of styrene with a minimum of 4 parts of methyl methacrylate and with up to 10 parts total of any one or more of the following monomers: butyl methacrylate, methacrylic acid, butyl acrylate, acrylic acid and allyl methacrylate
